entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
